GSD.description:
scsi: libfc: Fix use after free in fc_exch_abts_resp()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.238 by commit 6044ad64f41c87382cfeeca281573d1886d80cbe. For more details please see the references link.
